function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Operators sharing data without proper sanitation or protection measures","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through shared data","Mitigation":"Implement data sanitation protocols and provide operators with protective equipment","Technologies":"Data encryption, secure file transfer protocols","People":"Operators, decision maker","Owner":"Technology team, decision maker"},{"Description":"Inaccurate translation of Unix time stamp into Date and Time","Impact":"Confusion and misinterpretation of time-related data","Mitigation":"Use automated scripts or software to ensure accurate translation of time stamps","Technologies":"Scripting languages, time conversion libraries","People":"Planners, decision maker","Owner":"Data analysis team, planners"},{"Description":"Replicating solutions in the physical system without proper testing","Impact":"Risk of introducing new issues or exacerbating existing problems","Mitigation":"Thorough testing of solutions in the virtual model before implementation","Technologies":"Simulation software, virtual modeling tools","People":"Planners, system operators","Owner":"Simulation team, planners"}]}
